data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed: <story>We～～～～～i♪

data.text:
Helios! You brought an unfamiliar face with ya today. 
Friend?
data.name: Young Woman
data.processed:
<story>Helios! You brought an unfamiliar face with ya today. 
<story>Friend?

data.text:
Yep! Name's Trai-pi. 
We tight～☆
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Yep! Name's Trai-pi. 
<story>We tight～☆

data.text:
Ever since our eyes met! 
Even our breathing's in sync☆
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Ever since our eyes met! 
<story>Even our breathing's in sync☆

data.text:
Oh! It's here, it's here～～!! 
I really like this song!! Let's dance!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Oh! It's here, it's here～～!! 
<story>I really like this song!! Let's dance!

data.text:
Like this. Ride the rhythm～…… 
Just move with it! And flow!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Like this. Ride the rhythm～…… 
<story>Just move with it! And flow!

data.text:
Just dance like boom boom♪ is what I'm saying! If that's too 
hard, just match me! If you don't it'll be a real bummer～
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Just dance like boom boom♪ is what I'm saying! If that's too 
<story>hard, just match me! If you don't it'll be a real bummer～

data.text:
If I ruin the mood, then there's a chance I 
won't get to talk to her. Besides, when in Rome……
data.processed:
<story>If I ruin the mood, then there's a chance I 
<story>won't get to talk to her. Besides, when in Rome……

data.text:
Hyuuu, that's the spirit～☆ Trai-pi livin' it up, lookin' good☆ 
Team Heli-T is gonna tear it up!!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Hyuuu, that's the spirit～☆ Trai-pi livin' it up, lookin' good☆ 
<story>Team Heli-T is gonna tear it up!!

data.text:
And so, I got caught up in Daitaku Helios' antics…… 
No, maybe I was drawn in like a moth to the flame―
data.processed:
<story>And so, I got caught up in Daitaku Helios' antics…… 
<story>No, maybe I was drawn in like a moth to the flame―

data.text:
―So, about the next "Fireside-chat Party"! 
The association chairman suggested a potluck picnic!
data.name: Shopper A
data.processed:
<story>―So, about the next "Fireside-chat Party"! 
<story>The association chairman suggested a potluck picnic!

data.text:
Sounds awesome～! When I cook I always end up burning everything! 
If ya need something bitter, leave it to me!☆
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Sounds awesome～! When I cook I always end up burning everything! 
<story>If ya need something bitter, leave it to me!☆

data.text:
Ufufuu, a little charring makes it spicy! ……or something! 
Ever since Helios-chan started joining in, it's been more fun.
data.name: Shopper A
data.processed:
<story>Ufufuu, a little charring makes it spicy! ……or something! 
<story>Ever since Helios-chan started joining in, it's been more fun.

data.text:
Cooperation between other associations has been 
going smoothly too. The picnic too, sounds like 
there's going to be a lot of people!
data.name: Shopper B
data.processed:
<story>Cooperation between other associations has been 
<story>going smoothly too. The picnic too, sounds like 
<story>there's going to be a lot of people!

data.text:
Hyuuu～♪ Instead of a park maybe we need a dome!? 
A Fireside-chat picnic in a dome sounds wild☆
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Hyuuu～♪ Instead of a park maybe we need a dome!? 
<story>A Fireside-chat picnic in a dome sounds wild☆

data.text: True that☆
data.name: Everyone
data.processed: <story>True that☆

data.text:
―And then, you line up some vinyl pools! 
Don't you wanna make a beach for Gramps and Granny!? Count me in!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>―And then, you line up some vinyl pools! 
<story>Don't you wanna make a beach for Gramps and Granny!? Count me in!

data.text:
Fufu, that sounds fun. 
Seems like Summer will be coming for even an old man like me.
data.name: Old Man
data.processed:
<story>Fufu, that sounds fun. 
<story>Seems like Summer will be coming for even an old man like me.

data.text:
Helios-chan, I wanna help too! 
I'll get the other kids from my school too～ ehehe♪
data.name: Small Child
data.processed:
<story>Helios-chan, I wanna help too! 
<story>I'll get the other kids from my school too～ ehehe♪

data.text:
We～i, everyone's welcome☆ 
The entire world is my friend-!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>We～i, everyone's welcome☆ 
<story>The entire world is my friend-!

data.text:
The smiles just seemed to gather around Daitaku Helios. It must 
have been because she, herself, was always smiling…… from the 
bottom of her heart―
data.processed:
<story>The smiles just seemed to gather around Daitaku Helios. It must 
<story>have been because she, herself, was always smiling…… from the 
<story>bottom of her heart―

data.text:
Ah～ Good times, good times☆ 
Today was extra lit!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Ah～ Good times, good times☆ 
<story>Today was extra lit!

data.text:
After spending the day with her, I felt I understood her a little 
better. An endless well of brightness, a girl that drew everyone 
to her like the Sun. But, still……
data.processed:
<story>After spending the day with her, I felt I understood her a little 
<story>better. An endless well of brightness, a girl that drew everyone 
<story>to her like the Sun. But, still……

data.text:
A girl that enjoyed life this much, why would she choose Tracen 
Academy…… there had to be a big reason for it hidden somewhere.
data.processed:
<story>A girl that enjoyed life this much, why would she choose Tracen 
<story>Academy…… there had to be a big reason for it hidden somewhere.

data.text:
Alright, on to the last event! 
Time for a race～!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Alright, on to the last event! 
<story>Time for a race～!

data.text:
―Yooooo. 
Right, let's get started～☆
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>―Yooooo. 
<story>Right, let's get started～☆

data.text:
The heck's that!? 
Sounds rough～ hilarious!!
data.name: Daitaku Helios

choices.text: Didn't you run a mock race yesterday?
choices.processed: <size=43>Didn't you run a mock race yesterday?</size>

choices.text: Didn't you run a mock race yesterday?
choices.processed: <size=43>Didn't you run a mock race yesterday?</size>

data.processed:
<story>The heck's that!? 
<story>Sounds rough～ hilarious!!

data.text:
Well, the day ain't over 'til I've run. 
Gotta wrap it all up with the most fun thing of all, right!?
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Well, the day ain't over 'til I've run. 
<story>Gotta wrap it all up with the most fun thing of all, right!?

data.text:
'Course! Today was an absolute blast though～, 
but nothin' beats a race☆
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>'Course! Today was an absolute blast though～, 
<story>but nothin' beats a race☆

data.text:
'Cuz I can hit it with everything? And it really 
gets the blood pumpin'!? It's wicked how all those 
emotions clash!! And it feels great～☆
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>'Cuz I can hit it with everything? And it really 
<story>gets the blood pumpin'!? It's wicked how all those 
<story>emotions clash!! And it feels great～☆

data.text:
Wait…… that's wild! You don't know how awesome 
races are? Eh, that has to be it, otherwise 
normally you wouldn't ask that, right!?
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Wait…… that's wild! You don't know how awesome 
<story>races are? Eh, that has to be it, otherwise 
<story>normally you wouldn't ask that, right!?

data.text:
Heeey, everyone's ready-. 
Helios, you need to Gate In too～.
data.name: Helios' Classmate A
data.processed:
<story>Heeey, everyone's ready-. 
<story>Helios, you need to Gate In too～.

data.text:
……guess there's no helping it☆ Hey～! 
I'm gonna run carrying this person!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>……guess there's no helping it☆ Hey～! 
<story>I'm gonna run carrying this person!

data.text: Haaaa～～～!?
data.name: Helios' Classmate A
data.processed: <story>Haaaa～～～!?

data.text:
Hyuu～～～～!! 
Blast off――――!!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Hyuu～～～～!! 
<story>Blast off――――!!

data.text:
The race started with Daitaku Helios forcibly carrying me! 
She ran at top speed right from the start―
data.processed:
<story>The race started with Daitaku Helios forcibly carrying me! 
<story>She ran at top speed right from the start―

data.text:
Ahahaa!! It ain't scary! 
Feel it with your whole body! It's theeeeeee beeeeeeeest～～～～!!!!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Ahahaa!! It ain't scary! 
<story>Feel it with your whole body! It's theeeeeee beeeeeeeest～～～～!!!!

data.text:
Urged on by her words, I steeled myself and then opened my eyes. 
When I did…… the wind, breath, footsteps, the beating in my 
chest…… hit me all at once―
data.processed:
<story>Urged on by her words, I steeled myself and then opened my eyes. 
<story>When I did…… the wind, breath, footsteps, the beating in my 
<story>chest…… hit me all at once―

data.text:
Weeeee～～～～～i!!!! 
Wild, right!?
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Weeeee～～～～～i!!!! 
<story>Wild, right!?

data.text:
Is there anything as awesome as this!? 
I love racing! I'm really down bad～～☆
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Is there anything as awesome as this!? 
<story>I love racing! I'm really down bad～～☆

data.text:
It's not that she's indifferent to winning or losing. It's just 
that, from the bottom of her heart, she just loves running…… and 
races themselves. What a free spirit―
data.processed:
<story>It's not that she's indifferent to winning or losing. It's just 
<story>that, from the bottom of her heart, she just loves running…… and 
<story>races themselves. What a free spirit―

data.text:
―And so, I'm last again!? 
Ain't that too tragic!?
data.name: Daitaku Helios

choices.text: I mean, you were carrying a person……
choices.processed: <size=42>I mean, you were carrying a person……</size>

data.processed:
<story>―And so, I'm last again!? 
<story>Ain't that too tragic!?

data.text:
Ain't that the truth☆ But it was still lit!! 
See, racing's the best, right!?
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Ain't that the truth☆ But it was still lit!! 
<story>See, racing's the best, right!?

data.text:
Honestly, for most of it I was clinging for dear 
life, so I wouldn't call that fun but…… I now 
understood her feelings. And also my own……
data.processed:
<story>Honestly, for most of it I was clinging for dear 
<story>life, so I wouldn't call that fun but…… I now 
<story>understood her feelings. And also my own……

data.text:
For that girl who shone like the sun, and was as free as could 
be, I wanted to cheer her on. Once you stripped away everything 
else, only that simple feeling remained.
data.processed:
<story>For that girl who shone like the sun, and was as free as could 
<story>be, I wanted to cheer her on. Once you stripped away everything 
<story>else, only that simple feeling remained.

data.text:
―But that's exactly why it was such a waste. "It's 
fun whether I win or lose," this stance was one 
that…… didn't understand the joy of winning.

choices.text: (For her, it'll be even more fun)

data.processed:
<story>―But that's exactly why it was such a waste. "It's 
<story>fun whether I win or lose," this stance was one 
<story>that…… didn't understand the joy of winning.

data.text:
Hey, let's go again! 
This time without carrying someone! Hey, sounds great, right!?
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Hey, let's go again! 
<story>This time without carrying someone! Hey, sounds great, right!?

data.text:
Eh～!? No way! Besides, 
normally it's not something you can do multiple days in a row!
data.name: Helios' Classmate A
data.processed:
<story>Eh～!? No way! Besides, 
<story>normally it's not something you can do multiple days in a row!

data.text:
Then, Trai-pi! I choose you! 
Use Parallel Running!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Then, Trai-pi! I choose you! 
<story>Use Parallel Running!

data.text:
The race was awesome, right!? Then, this time use your own two 
feet～ and battle it out with me～☆ Gate In, wei!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>The race was awesome, right!? Then, this time use your own two 
<story>feet～ and battle it out with me～☆ Gate In, wei!
